div.h2: Imagine What Your Child Could Do With the Right Education
div.p: North Carolina Virtual Academy (NCVA), an online public charter school authorized by the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction, will work in partnership with you to awaken the joy of learning in your child.
The result can be greater academic success, confidence, and independence, both in school and beyond.
North Carolina Virtual Academy gives North Carolina children in grades K–11 the chance to learn in the ways that are right for them with:

ul.li: The award-winning curriculum from K12, the leading online K–12 curriculum provider and a CITA-accredited company
